properties.description:
This rule detects when a second Identity Provider (IdP) is added.

Handling Guidance: immediately escalate to the IAM team to identify if the additional IdP is expected.  Do not contact the InitiatingUser first, if they're adding a second IdP, they might be compromised.

Reference: https://ermetic.com/blog/cloud/the-mgm-breach-and-the-role-of-idp-in-modern-cyber-attacks/
